name: Pollinate
long_description:
Bad ERP data and no purpose-built tools mean the supply chain runs on spreadsheets or expensive custom built solutions.

We're solving this problem, starting with procurement teams, to automate three way matching of supplier invoices, using raw invoices from their email to match against purchase orders and landing receipts across ERP systems to make reconciliation frictionless.

Learn more at pollinate.tech
one_liner: AI Agents for the supply chain.
